org.fest.swing.fixture
Class JSliderFixture

java.lang.Object
  org.fest.swing.fixture.ComponentFixture<JSlider>
      org.fest.swing.fixture.JSliderFixture

public class JSliderFixture
extends ComponentFixture<JSlider>

Understands simulation of user events on a JSlider and verification of the state of such JSlider.

Author:
Yvonne Wang

JSliderFixture

public JSliderFixture(RobotFixture robot,
                      String sliderName)
Creates a new JSliderFixture.

Parameters:
robot - performs simulation of user events on a JSlider.
sliderName - the name of the JSlider to find using the given RobotFixture.
Throws:
ComponentLookupException - if a matching JSlider could not be found.
